welcome.title: Welcome to Perssua
welcome.description: Your realtime assistant during meetings, classes, podcasts, interviews, and online activities

account.title: Account
account.description: Log in to access premium features, sync your settings and track your usage.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the application interface.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.description: Manage your conversation data stored locally. All data is stored locally on your device.
dataManagement.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all data? This cannot be undone.

clearModal.title: Clear All Data
clearModal.warning: Are you sure you want to clear all data? This cannot be undone.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: This action is irreversible. All your data will be permanently deleted.
deleteAccount.modalTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccount.modalWarning: By deleting your account, you will lose access to all your data, history, and settings. This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.confirmLabel: To confirm, type DELETE MY ACCOUNT in the field below
deleteAccount.error: Error deleting account. Check your password.

history.clearHistoryWarning: This action will permanently delete all conversations. This cannot be undone.
history.deleteConversationWarning: This conversation will be permanently deleted. This cannot be undone.
history.selectSession: Select a session to view details.

general.detectableDescription: Primer is currently Detectable by screen-sharing.
general.undetectableDescription: Primer is now completely undetectable to screen-sharing.
general.title: General settings
general.description: Customize how Primer works for you.
general.openOnLogin: Open Primer when you log in
general.openOnLoginDescription: Primer will automatically open when you log in to your computer
general.themeDescription: Customize how Primer looks on your device
general.versionDescription: You are currently using Primer version
general.autoFocusDescription: Start typing instantly without clicking when Primer is shown

calendar.title: Visible Calendars
calendar.description: Upcoming meetings are synchronized from these calendars
calendar.getStarted: Get started by connecting a Google account.
calendar.deleteEventWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this event? This will remove it from Google Calendar as well.
calendar.info: Here you can view and manage events scheduled by the AI Assistant.
calendar.askToCreate: You don't have events scheduled. Ask the AI to create one for you.
calendar.tryChangingFilter: Try changing the filter to see more events.

resources.title: Resources
resources.description: Manage additional features and resource settings.

autoScroll.title: Auto Scroll
autoScroll.subtitle: Automatically scroll to the newest answer in the conversation
autoScroll.description: When enabled, the conversation will automatically scroll to the most recent AI response. Auto-scroll temporarily pauses when you scroll up to read history and resumes when you return to the bottom.

selectToPrompt.title: Select to Prompt
selectToPrompt.subtitle: Parse clipboard text with Ctrl+Shift+C
selectToPrompt.description: When enabled, selecting text and pressing Ctrl+Shift+C will automatically parse the content and provide insights.

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: Select the languages for audio interaction and AI responses.

transcription.title: Transcription language
transcription.description: The language you will be speaking during meetings.

output.title: Output language
output.description: The language Primer will use for responses and notes.

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Join our community on Discord to get help, share feedback, and connect.

support.title: Support
support.description: Need help with something specific? Check our documentation.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Need a refresher? Restart the onboarding guide to review permissions, audio settings, and API configurations.

shortcuts.title: Keyboard shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Visualize the configured keyboard shortcuts for your workflow.

general.title: General
general.askScreen: Ask Primer about your screen or anything
general.screenshot: Take a screenshot and submit to AI
general.clearConversation: Clear the current conversation with Primer
general.stealthMode: Start or stop a Stealth mode session

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.description: Your API key is stored locally and is never sent to our servers.

transcription.title: Transcription Model
transcription.description: Select the model used for voice transcription

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Choose your preferred balance between speed and quality. We will automatically select the best models for you.
performance.standardDescription: Good balance of speed and quality
performance.autoOptimize: Model selections are automatically optimized based on your performance choice.

gpt41.description: The most advanced model for complex analysis and multimodality.

gpt41nano.description: Ultra-fast and efficient version of GPT-4.1.

gpt4o.description: The versatile standard model for text, vision and audio.

gpt4omini.description: Fast and economical model for everyday tasks.

analysisModel.title: Analysis Model
analysisModel.description: Model used to analyze images and conversations

notion.title: Notion
notion.subtitle: Connect to your Notion workspace
notion.description: Allow Primer to create notes in your Notion workspace.

google.subtitle: Gemini 3 Pro, Gemini 2.5 and other models

gemini3pro.description: Next-generation Gemini model with advanced multimodal capabilities.

gemini25pro.description: Powerful model for complex reasoning and multimodal tasks.

gemini25flash.description: Model optimized for speed and cost efficiency.

gemini25flashlite.description: Ultra-lightweight and economical version of Flash.
